Description: The FHIR List resource defines a collection of records that can be used within many places. We support direct reading of the List resource to give access to Patient Lists. Reading is supported for those types of lists and system lists.
SampleResponse:
<Bundle xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<type value="searchset" />

<total value="1" />

<link>

<relation value="self" />

<url value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/List?identifier=systemlist%7C6442&code=PATientlist" />

</link>

<entry>

<link>

<relation value="self" />

<url value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/List/eF9VQMkt1WU0OUXwt.Rrdp7.GffjqBNwXjSDqVMY7LUY3" />

</link>

<fullUrl value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/List/eF9VQMkt1WU0OUXwt.Rrdp7.GffjqBNwXjSDqVMY7LUY3" />

<resource>

<List>

<id value="eF9VQMkt1WU0OUXwt.Rrdp7.GffjqBNwXjSDqVMY7LUY3" />

<status value="current" />

<mode value="working" />

<title value="Abby's Aspirin List" />

<code>

<text value="PatientList" />

</code>

<date value="2018-11-27T16:05:02Z" />

<entry>

<item>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/e3KNb7vncuN52v1YR1hK4kw3" />

<display value="Test, Danf T" />

</item>

</entry> <entry>

<item>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/e.16buEtVqGgfhBat-3GUVw3" />

<display value="Yge, Reviewnotrequired" />

</item>

</entry>

</List>

</resource>

<search>

<mode value="match" />

</search>

</entry>

</Bundle>

code.Name: code
code.Description: The code representing the type of list to search. Must be "patientlist".

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: An internal patient list ID in the format system|id, where 'system' is either mylist or systemlist and 'id' is an internal ID corresponding to the value of 'system'.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

List.Name: List
List.Description: An instance of the STU3 List resource

emptyReason.Name: emptyReason
emptyReason.Description: The reason the list is empty. If the list returns no data, value is "nilknown".

mode.Name: mode
mode.Description: The processing mode that applies to this list. Always "working". Values can be found here.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Status of the patient list. Always "current". Values can be found here.

title.Name: title
title.Description: The descriptive name for the list.

total.Name: total
total.Description: Total resources that match the search criteria.
